name: San Francisco Dental Society
description: A telephone referral service that provides names and phone numbers of dentists according to neighborhood served, foreign languages spoken, emergency hours, and who will accept Medi-Cal. Also refers seniors (age 60 or over) with a fixed income and lack of dental insurance to dentists who will provide comprehensive services for approximately 15% below their standard fees.
